description:
Modeling multilocus selection in an individual-based, spatially-explicit landscape genetics framework.

An individual-based, eco-evolutionary model for spatially-explicit simulation of population viability in landscape demogenetics.

Welcome to the CDMetaPOP v1.0 release! This release includes installation instructions, version notes, some examples, and technical documentation.

Baseline Requirements. CDMetaPOP requires the Python2.7.x interpreter, NumPy package, and SciPy package. Remember that Python modules usually require particular Python interpreters, so be sure the version ID for any external Python module or package (e.g. NumPy or others) matches the version of your Python interpreter (normally v2.7.x). aTo avoid Python installation errors, we highly recommend installing Python from any number of the freely available bundlers, e.g., Canopy, ActiveState, Anaconda.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'CDPOP', 'module', 'individual-based', 'spatially-explicit'
name: CDMetaPOP
